Class TweetLemma

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TweetLemma(java.lang.String lemma, double weight)
      Creates a TweetLemma, storing the corresponding String as well as information for further weighting, such as it being marked with a hashtag or a negation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TweetLemma

        public TweetLemma(java.lang.String lemma,
                  double weight)
        Creates a TweetLemma, storing the corresponding String as well as information for further weighting, such as it being marked with a hashtag or a negation.
        Parameters:
        lemma - lemmatized word
        weight - weight calculated from the proximity to the keyword in the initial tweet
        See Also:
        OpinionMiner.processTweets(Tweet), LemmaList.calculateSentiment()
